Posts.HTML:
Hi there, It's me again Akash Kumar.

In this thread, we'll post premade scripts and code for others to use.

Isn't it great to have everything you need at one place? ;)

Here are few premade scripts by forums members.

Gives section and pasaage link defferent color.
Code By: K.V

a.squiffy-link.link-section
{
    text-decoration: underline;
    color: Green;
    cursor: pointer;
}

a.squiffy-link.link-passage
{
    text-decoration: underline;
    color: Red;
    cursor: pointer;
}
How To Use: Copy and paste the above css code in your style.css file.
